evidence.text:
Person B: Like a car.
Person B: A dark road, on a rainy night? It could have been a hit and run.

Person A: Kendall was 5'5. If she was hunched over and the car was an SUV or a truck, she could've easily been hit smack across the head and torso. Look at the way her shoulders are fractured...
Person A: Not yet. 3rd-year med student.
Person B: Well, then I think we should leave this to the professionals who actually examined the body.
Person A: Good, because we're not here to solve a mystery. All we're here to do is decide if we're positive that James Sythe killed Kendall Carter.
